name: Monomachos
description:
A cute, cozy and relaxing 2D collectathon game made for the Godot Wild Jam #40. Explore the forest and find beautiful little items to decorate your home. There are 21 items to find? I'm not sure. Check the source code bro.

Random tip: If you feel lost, go to your home. Maybe something has changed there.

The song used in the game is Snow May Never End by qubodup (OpenGameArt.org).
